Episodes.Title: Final Call
Episodes.Actors: Idris Elba, Neil Maskell, Christine Adams
Episodes.Plot: Sam Nelson gets on a flight to London hoping to win back his ex-wife, but something on board feels wrong--and his suspicions are confirmed.

Episodes.Title: 3 Degrees
Episodes.Actors: Idris Elba, Neil Maskell, Eve Myles
Episodes.Plot: Spotting an opportunity, Sam executes a plan to get a covert message to authorities on the ground.

Episodes.Title: Draw a Blank
Episodes.Writer: George Kay, Jim Field Smith, Adam Gyngell
Episodes.Actors: Idris Elba, Neil Maskell, Eve Myles
Episodes.Plot: As the UK's counter terrorism unit learns of flight KA29, Sam gets involved in a risky plan to take on the hijackers.

Episodes.Title: Not Responding
Episodes.Writer: George Kay, Jim Field Smith, Kam Odedra
Episodes.Actors: Idris Elba, Neil Maskell, Eve Myles
Episodes.Plot: An incident team in Westminster scrambles to intercept fighter jets. Sam tries contacting the ground once more when a hijacker is injured.

Episodes.Title: Less Than an Hour
Episodes.Writer: George Kay, Jim Field Smith, Anna-Maria Ssemuyaba
Episodes.Actors: Idris Elba, Neil Maskell, Eve Myles
Episodes.Plot: Sam attemps to convince the hijackers to land the plane. A list of demands reveals who's behind the hijacking.

Episodes.Title: Comply Slowly
Episodes.Writer: George Kay, Jim Field Smith, Catherine Moulton
Episodes.Actors: Idris Elba, Neil Maskell, Eve Myles
Episodes.Plot: Faced with an impossible decision, the passengers ready themselves for a fight.

Episodes.Title: Brace Brace Brace
Episodes.Actors: Idris Elba, Neil Maskell, Eve Myles
Episodes.Plot: A new threat emerges onboard as Sam struggles to control the chaos unfolding around him.
